DataSource.statement: SELECT workDoc.id as workDocId, workDoc.code as workDocCode, workDoc.relatedBillCode as relatedBillCode, workDoc.status as workDocStatus, CONCAT(CONCAT(cast(workDoc.putawayQty,string), '/'), cast(workDoc.qty,string)) AS workDocQtyTotal FROM WmsWorkDoc workDoc WHERE 1=1 AND workDoc.type='PUTAWAY' AND (workDoc.keeper.id =#{SESSION_USERS} OR workDoc.keeper.id IS NULL) AND workDoc.warehouse.baseOrganization.id = #{SESSION_BASE_ORGAN} AND workDoc.status IN ('ENABLED','IN_OPERATION') /~ workDocCodeSearch: AND ( workDoc.code like '%{workDocCodeSearch}%' or workDoc.relatedBillCode like '%{workDocCodeSearch}%' ) ~/ ORDER BY workDoc.updateInfo.createdTime asc
